name: .LTB File Extension
summary: Learn about .LTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created for LithTech Jupiter, a graphical video game engine; contains graphic models such as weapons, characters, maps, and textures referenced for developing games like "F.E.A.R." and "Combat Arms."

content: NOTE: LithTech Jupiter Ex was released in 2005 and remains the latest engine release. It was last developed by Touchdown Entertainment, which was formerly known as LithTech, Inc. (which was developed by Monolith Productions).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
